2.) Add a new property to CommerceCartParameter in a beans.xml file.
3.) Extend the default strategy called by the method to handle the new parameter.
4.) Extend the default implementation of the method to handle the new parameter.

questions.QuestionText: Which features does the Cloud Hot Folders module support? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Direct configuration of Hot Folders in the Cloud Portal
2.) Media using external URLs in uploaded ImpEx
3.) Zip archives with Impex, media and CSV files
4.) Data export into Azure Blob storage.

questions.QuestionText: What can you do within the integration UI Tool in Backoffice? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Create a search restriction to secure an integration object for only a certain integration user group.
2.) Set up access rights for integration objects.
3.) Force-delete an integration object even if it is associated with an InboundChannelConfiguration (ICC).
4.) Export the configuration types so that they can be imported into a target system.

questions.QuestionText: Which of the following can you configure in a widget definition (definition.xml) file? (3 correct)
Options: 4.) The default values for widget settings
5.) The business logic of the widget via a bean shell script

questions.QuestionText: How many category items will the following ImpEx create?
What type of class should you implement when you need to change the trigger for recalculating the user experience results?
What must you always specify when you are creating a new Adaptive Search Profile? (3 correct)

Options: 1.) No entries will be updated or inserted.
2.) Only the Title with code that equals "baz" will be updated or inserted.
3.) All data rows will be cleared of unnecessary space.
4.) All "foo", "bar", and "baz" codes will be updated or inserted.
questions.QuestionText: Assuming that property impex.legacy.scripting is set to false and 'Enable code execution' is checked, what are the results of the following ImpEx script?
Which component configurations does the ServiceLayer architecture promote? (3 correct)
Which services are included in the basecommerce extension to address customer services functionality? (3 correct)
Which configuration options are available on a cache region? (3 correct)

In an extension named myext, you defined Pump, a subtype of the Product item type with a property named efficiency. You have also extended the productDTO bean to have an efficiency property. To copy the efficiency property to the productDTO, what do you need to do? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Write a PumpProductConverter class that extends AbstractPopulatingConverter, and copies the efficiency property from the Pump item to the productDTO bean if the item is an instance of Pump. Configure an instance of this converter in myext-spring.xml.

2.) Make sure the definition of the Pump item type defines the efficiency attribute with persistence type property. When you run ant all, the productConverter class generated in bootstrap/gensrc will copy the efficiency property to the productDTO.

3.) Create a PumpPopulator class that extends ProductPopulator and, if necessary, copies the efficiency property from the Pump item to the productDTO bean. In myext-spring.xml, redefine the productPopulator alias to point to an instance of PumpPopulator.

4.) Write a PumpAttributePopulator class that copies the efficiency property from the item to the OTO only if its method is passed an instance of PumpModel. Define a bean for this new class in myext-spring.xml, and use a modifyPopulatorList bean to add it to the productConverter's list of populators.

questions.QuestionText: To install and configure the Solr server in cloud mode, which sequence of steps should you use?
Options: 1.) Disable the autostart for the default instance. Enable the autostart for the cloud instance. Set the cloud instance mode to true.
2.) Disable the autostart for the cloud instance. Enable the autostart for the default instance. Set the default instance mode to cloud.
3.) Disable the autostart for the default instance. Enable the autostart for the cloud instance. Set the cloud instance mode to cloud.
4.) Disable the autostart for the cloud instance. Enable the autostart for the default instance. Set the cloud instance mode to true.

questions.QuestionText: You are creating a new ancillary catalog for your site. Which of the following principles should you consider? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Restrict the read and write access of this catalog in its permission tab in Backoffice.
2.) A catalog version has a hierarchy of categories, containing products.
3.) A catalog must have at least 2 versions: staged and online.
4.) You can create an unlimited number of catalog versions under this catalog.

questions.QuestionText: To define the data that gets extracted into the Solr index for searching, what do you need to provide? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) A flexible search query for an incremental update
3.) An ImpEx script for a full load
4.) A flexible search query for a full load

questions.QuestionText: You are creating a product with a new feature using a classification system. What should you pay attention to? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Use feature descriptor values if the values of the new feature are limited to a selection.
2.) Create an empty classification unit even if the new feature doesn't have a unit.
3.) Use a feature descriptor to represent the name of the new feature and assign it to the product.
4.) Create a classifying category with an attribute assignment model and assign it to the product.

questions.QuestionText: In personalization (based on SmartEdit), you want to configure when the experience calculation is triggered for registered customers without requiring any customization. What are the available options? (3 correct)
Options: 1.) Trigger the experience calculation for certain URL patterns.
2.) Trigger the experience calculation after a defined number of requests.
3.) Trigger the experience calculation when the customer logs in.
4.) Trigger the experience calculation when the customer adds a product to the cart.
5.) Trigger the experience calculation when the customer is promoted to a reward-level status.

questions.QuestionText: You need to create a CronJob for an automated task that will be performed every day at midnight. Which steps would you follow? (3 correct)
Options: 1.) Register the JobPerformable bean in your extension's Spring configuration file.
2.) Define the Cronjob logic in a class that implements the JobPerformable interface.
3.) Perform a system update for essential data.
4.) Perform a system update for sample data.
5.) Create a CronJob item and a trigger for midnight using ImpEx or Backoffice.

questions.QuestionText: Where are enumerations stored? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Dynamic enumerations are stored in the active session.
2.) Non-dynamic enumerations are stored as SpEL lists in Spring.
3.) Dynamic enumerations are stored in the database.
4.) Non-dynamic enumerations are stored as enumeration classes.

questions.QuestionText: What causes item data to be invalidated in the SAP Commerce Cloud entity cache? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Receiving an invalidation event for the item via cluster messaging
2.) Calling the modelService.create() method passing a Model class
3.) Calling a setter method on a Model class
4.) Calling the modelService.save() method passing an item model

questions.QuestionText: Which of the following is a mechanism used by WCMS to position components on a page?
Options: 1.) The Page item has a position map that links each component to the component in the page that the item should be displayed in.
2.) The ContentSlot item's code property is used to determine which slot in the page that the item should be displayed in.
3.) The component's CurrentPosition attribute is used to determine which component within the page the item should be displayed in.
4.) The position attribute in the ContentSlotForTemplate item is used to identify the slot in the page that the item should be displayed in.

questions.QuestionText: You are creating a new SolrlndexProperty as a facet and want to define it using facet ranges. What do you need to do to achieve that?
Options: 1.) Manually create SolrValueRange items to define the range boundaries. Create a SolrValueRangeSet, add SolrValueRange items, and add to the SolrlndexProperty.
2.) Define the number of ranges in the SolrlndexProperty. Provide sample data that isused to generate the SolrValueRange items.
3.) Define the cadence of the ranges in the SolrlndexProperty. Provide the sample data that is used to generate the SolrValueRangeSet.
4.) Create SolrValueRange items to define the range boundaries. Add them to the SolrlndexProperty.

questions.Content:
<?xml version="l.O"nencoding="IS0-8859-1"?>
<itemtypes>
    <itemtype code=" Passport" autocreate="true" ngenerate="true">
        <deployment typecode="8995" table="passport"/>
        <!--   ...atributes-->
    </itemtype>
    <itemtype code="Student" extends="Customer" autocreate="true" ngenerate="true">
        <attribute type="localized:Passport" nqualifier="identification">
            <persistence type="property"/>
        </attribute>
    </itemtype>
</itemtypes>
Options: 1.) Define a one-to-many relation between Student and Passport using a relation tag with parameter localized="true". Add a maptype tag for localized:Passport with parameters argumenttype="Language" and returntype="Passport". Run an ant updatesystem command. A passportlp table will be generated to store the localized property values. Define a localized Passport attribute for the Student type in myext/resources/localization/myext-locales_XY.properties.
2.) Add a maptype tag for localized:Passport with parameters argumenttype="Language" and returntype="Passport".
3.) Run an ant updatesystem command. A passportlp table will be generated to store the localized property values.
4.) Define a localized Passport attribute for the Student type in myext/resources/localization/myext-locales_XY.properties.

questions.QuestionText: What can you do in the Builds workspace in Cloud Portal? (2 correct)

3.) Deploy a successful build to a certain environment

2.) Apply a variation to customers who belong to a combination of segments.
3.) Show different content in a slot if a variation is in effect.
4.) More than one variation in a customization can be triggered at the same time.
5.) Give the customer a coupon if a variation is in effect.

questions.QuestionText: When a customer places an order using the default order management process defined in the yacceleratorfulfilmentprocess extension, when does the fulfillment process send the notification that the order has been placed?
Options: 1.) After the order has been fraud checked
2.) After the order has been completely sourced
3.) At the first stage of the fulfillment process
4.) After the payment has been processed

questions.QuestionText: Which of the following configurations can be done to a ContentSlot? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Assign it to a maximum of one page using a ContentSlotForPage item.
2.) Add a list of CMSComponents to it.
3.) Assign it to one or more pages using ContentSlotForPage items.
4.) Define valid CMS Components for it by modifying the ElementsForSlot relation.

questions.QuestionText: What is the purpose of the dynamic forms in the Backoffice?
Options: 1.) To provide a dynamic extension of type definitions in the SAP Commerce platform
2.) To provide dynamic client-side validation of web forms
3.) To provide a dynamic layout of the wizards at runtime using drag and drop
4.) To enable dynamic behaviors in the user interface of Backoffice applications

questions.QuestionText: During development, how do you ensure that the modified resources of an installed addon get copied into the storefront? (2 correct)
In an Accelerator-based storefront, which of the following would allow you to display a custom CMS Component? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Create a JSP named [componentTypeCode].jsp that pulls data from a [ComponentTypeCode]Data object.
2.) Configure a custom controller bean and redefine the DefaultCMSComponentController alias to point to it.
3.) Configure a renderer in the cmsComponentRendererRegistry that doesn't need to use a data object or a view.

questions.QuestionText: Which of the following are valid types of environments in SAP Commerce Cloud in the public cloud? (3 correct)

The miniature car replicas your company sells on its site are now available in a choice of colors, each at a different price point. You wish your product page to allow your customers to select the color before adding the replica to the cart. To complicate things, your boss won't let you restart your production servers to add this functionality. What entities would you have to create to achieve this?
Options: 1.) A ConfigurationCategory, an AbstractConfiguratorSetting for color, a ConfiguratorType, and an OrderEntryProductlnfo for each color a given replica is available in.
2.) A VariantCategory for color, a VariantValueCategory for each color, and a GenericVariantProduct for each color a given replica is available in.

3.) A ClassficationCategory, a ClassificationAttribute for color, a ClassificationAttributeUnit, a ClassificationAttributeValue for each color a given replica is available in, and a ClassAttributeAssignmentModel instance to tie them together.
4.) A ComposedType, that extends the VariantProduct type to add a color attribute, and an instance of this type for each color a given replica is available in.

questions.QuestionText: You are implementing a new custom promotion action that changes the delivery mode of an order. What steps are required to make sure that the effects of this action are reverted as soon as the condition that triggered it is NO longer fulfilled? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Implement the undo method in your custom rule action strategy
2.) Define a new session attribute to store the original delivery mode
3.) Implement your custom action item so that it can store the original delivery mode
4.) Create a promotion that uses the inverse action if the condition is NOT fulfilled

questions.QuestionText: Which of the following steps could be included in the process of installing an AddOn? (3 correct)
Options: 5.) Copy files from the storefront to the AddOn web source folder.

questions.QuestionText: When are consignments created for an order in the default order management implementation?

2.) After the order is placed, but before it is sourced successfully
3.) When the user adds items to the cart
4.) After the order is placed and after it has been sourced successfully

questions.QuestionText: How can you start a business process in SAP Commerce Cloud? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) Use the hot folder functionality by creating a file in the configured hot file.
2.) Use the Backoffice Business Process section.
3.) Invoke the appropriate method of the BusinessProcessService from a script in the hybris Administration Console (hAC) scripting console.
4.) Invoke the appropriate method of the BusinessProcessService from Java code.

questions.QuestionText: How does Spartacus compare to the SAP Commerce Cloud Accelerators? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) They have the same feature parity, but Spartacus is more upgradable.
2.) Accelerators are JSP-based while Spartacus is JavaScript-based.
3.) They are both using OCC API to connect to the commerce platform.
4.) They are both extensible according to project requirement.

questions.QuestionText: How is the primary key (PK) for an SAP Commerce Cloud item created? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) It is automatically generated and assigned.
2.) It is generated from a counter and the type code of the item.
3.) It is generated from the item's unique business key(s).
4.) It is provided by the user in the Create wizard or as a column value in ImpEx.

questions.QuestionText: Why are rule-aware objects (RAOs) used in the rule engine? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) To store the configuration of the rule engine
2.) To provide the data as facts in rule conditions and actions
3.) To persist the results of the rule evaluation
4.) To eliminate unnecessary data provided by complex objects

questions.QuestionText: You are creating an extension with a web module. What do you need to ensure? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) An extension with a web module can only be extended with an addon.
2.) An extension with a web module must have a web folder.
3.) An extension with a web module must always have a core module.
4.) The web root must be set in the web module directive in the extensioninfo.xml file.

questions.QuestionText: What happens when you use a deployment tag in the items.xml file? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) All instances of the enclosing type are stored in the specified database table.
2.) Only non-inherited properties of the enclosing type are stored in the deployment table.
3.) The deployment typecode is used as part of the primary key (PK) of that type's items.
4.) The name of the deployment table is generated automatically.

questions.QuestionText: You need to create a new custom promotion based on customer reviews for a product. You create a customPromotion extension with a new Rule Aware Object to keep customer reviews. In which file will you define this new Rule Aware Object?

The system renders the Product Detail Page for Pink Candle using the following flexible search query: "SELECT {pk} FROM {VariantProduct} WHERE {code}="PinkCandle". What happens next?
Options: 1.) The flexible search query returns a null value.
3.) The flexible search query returns an SQL exception.

questions.QuestionText: How are relations modeled in the database? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) One-to-many relations are stored in the links table.
3.) One-to-many relations are stored in a column.
4.) Many-to-many relations are deployed as a table.

questions.QuestionText: What is SmartEdit's Navigation Management page useful for? (2 correct)
Options: 1.) It can define more than one navigation hierarchy, each accessed by a different component on the page.
2.) It allows you to manipulate a hierarchy of CMSNavigationNode items, each of which may contain a CMSNavigationEntry.
3.) It allows you to manipulate a parent-child hierarchy of CMSLinkComponent objects.
4.) It is used to configure automatic mapping of the Product Catalog's category hierarchy to the navigation bar displayed on site pages.

$catalogversion=catalogversion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true,default=$catalog-id:$catalog-version]

;product2;;product2;pieces;approved;

questions.QuestionText: You are developing an SAP BTP application for a company that wants to implement single sign-on (SSO) with their existing Microsoft Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) identity provider. What is SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP)?

4.) A database management system for SAP HANA

questions.QuestionText: What is the purpose of a code repository in SAP development?

Options: 3.) By adding complexity to SAP deployment

questions.QuestionText: Scenario: An SAP development team is adopting version control. Which version control systems are suitable for SAP development in this scenario?  (Select all that apply.)

Scenario: A company is implementing a bug tracking system for its SAP projects. How does this system aid in issue resolution and defect tracking in this SAP bug tracking scenario? (Select all that apply.)
Options: 1.) By increasing defects in the code
3.) By identifying defects and tracking their resolution

questions.QuestionText: Scenario: A company is implementing a bug tracking system for its SAP projects. How does this system aid in issue resolution in this SAP bug tracking scenario? (Select all that apply.)
Options: 1.) It introduces more defects in the code
3.) It identifies defects and tracks their resolution
4.) It eliminates the need for automated testing
